sourcesContent: import React,{useState,useEffect,useCallback} from'react';import{searchPhotos} from'./api';import{useParams,Link} from'react-router-dom';import{Grid,Card,CardMedia,CardContent,Typography,Skeleton,Alert,Container,Box,Button} from'@mui/material';import RefreshIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Refresh';function CategoryPage(){const{category}=useParams();const[photos,setPhotos]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[refreshKey,setRefreshKey]=useState(0);const loadPhotos=useCallback(async()=>{try{setError(null);setLoading(true);const response=await searchPhotos(category);setPhotos(response.data.results);}catch(error){setError("Kategori fotoğrafları yüklenirken bir hata oluştu. Lütfen daha sonra tekrar deneyin.");console.error("Kategori fotoğrafları yüklenirken hata oluştu:",error);}finally{setLoading(false);}},[category]);useEffect(()=>{loadPhotos();},[loadPhotos,refreshKey]);if(error){return(<Container maxWidth="lg"><Alert severity="error" sx={{mt:4}}>{error}<Button onClick={loadPhotos} sx={{ml:2}}><RefreshIcon sx={{mr:1}}/>Tekrar Dene</Button></Alert></Container>);}const categoryTitle=category.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+category.slice(1)+" Kategorisi";return(<Container maxWidth="lg"><Box sx={{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',alignItems:'center',mb:4,mt:2}}><Typography variant="h4" component="h1" fontWeight={700} color="text.primary">{categoryTitle}</Typography><Button variant="outlined" startIcon={<RefreshIcon/>} onClick={()=>setRefreshKey(prev=>prev+1)} sx={{borderRadius:2}}>Yeni Fotoğraflar</Button></Box><Grid container spacing={3}>{loading?Array.from(new Array(12)).map((_,i)=> (<Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4} lg={3} key={`skeleton-${i}`}><Skeleton variant="rectangular" height={200} sx={{borderRadius:1}}/><Skeleton sx={{mt:1,height:20}}/></Grid>)):photos.map(photo=>(<Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4} lg={3} key={photo.id}><Card sx={{height:'100%'}}><Link to={`/photo/${photo.id}`} style={{textDecoration:'none'}}><CardMedia component="img" height="200" image={photo.urls.small} alt={photo.alt_description}/></Link><CardContent sx={{p:2}}><Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" sx={{height:40,overflow:'hidden'}}>{photo.alt_description||'Açıklama yok'}</Typography></CardContent></Card></Grid>))}</Grid></Container>);}export default CategoryPage;
